web-development.title: Custom Web Development
web-development.description: Transform your business with professional, custom-built websites that drive results. We create responsive, fast, and secure web solutions tailored to your unique needs.
web-development.heroDescription: Transform your business with professional, custom-built websites that drive results. We create responsive, fast, and secure web solutions tailored to your unique needs.
web-development.overviewDescription: We combine cutting-edge technology with proven development practices to deliver websites that not only look amazing but perform exceptionally.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Your website will look perfect on all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Optimized for speed with loading times under 3 seconds guaranteed.

features.title: Secure & Reliable
features.description: Built with security best practices and reliable hosting solutions.

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.description: Built for search engines to help you rank higher and attract more visitors.

features.title: User-Centered Design
features.description: Designed with your users in mind for maximum engagement and conversions.

features.title: Ongoing Support
features.description: We're here to help with updates, maintenance, and technical support.

web-development.technologiesDescription: We use cutting-edge technologies and frameworks to build modern, scalable websites.
web-development.processDescription: We follow a proven methodology to ensure your project is delivered on time and exceeds expectations.

processSteps.title: Discovery & Planning
processSteps.description: We start by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements. This phase includes competitor analysis, user research, and technical planning.

processSteps.title: Design & Prototyping
processSteps.description: Our designers create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups that bring your vision to life. We iterate based on your feedback to perfect the design.

processSteps.title: Development & Integration
processSteps.description: Our developers build your website using modern technologies and best practices. We integrate all necessary features and ensure cross-browser compatibility.

processSteps.title: Testing & Launch
processSteps.description: We thoroughly test your website across devices and browsers, optimize for performance, and ensure everything works perfectly before launch.

web-development.packagesDescription: Choose the perfect package for your needs. All packages include responsive design, SEO optimization, and 3 months of support.

packages.name: Starter Website
packages.description: Perfect for small businesses and personal brands

packages.name: Professional Website
packages.description: Ideal for growing businesses and e-commerce

packages.name: Enterprise Solution
packages.description: For large businesses and complex applications

web-development.projectsDescription: See how we've helped businesses like yours succeed with custom web development.

featuredProjects.title: Corporate Website Redesign
featuredProjects.description: Complete redesign and development of a corporate website with CMS integration and improved user experience.

featuredProjects.title: SaaS Platform Development
featuredProjects.description: Full-stack development of a SaaS platform with user management, billing integration, and real-time features.

web-development.faqDescription: Common questions about our web development services.

faqs.question: What's included in the web development service?
faqs.answer: Our web development service includes custom design, responsive development, SEO optimization, testing, deployment, and ongoing support. We also provide training on how to manage your website.

faqs.question: How long does web development take?
faqs.answer: Timeline depends on the complexity of your project. Simple websites take 2-4 weeks, while complex web applications can take 8-16 weeks. We provide detailed timelines during our consultation.

faqs.question: Do I own the website after it's built?
faqs.answer: Yes! You own all rights to your website including the code, design, and content. We provide you with all source files and documentation upon project completion.

faqs.question: Can you work with my existing hosting?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can work with any hosting provider. We can also recommend optimal hosting solutions based on your requirements and help with migration if needed.

web-development.ctaDescription: Let's discuss your project and create a website that drives real results for your business.

ecommerce-solutions.title: E-commerce Development Solutions
ecommerce-solutions.description: Build powerful online stores that drive sales with our comprehensive e-commerce development services. From payment processing to inventory management, we've got you covered.
ecommerce-solutions.heroDescription: Build powerful online stores that drive sales with our comprehensive e-commerce development services. From payment processing to inventory management, we create complete digital storefronts.
ecommerce-solutions.overviewDescription: We build e-commerce platforms that not only look great but are optimized for conversions, security, and scalability.

features.title: Shopping Cart & Checkout
features.description: Smooth, secure checkout process optimized for conversion and user experience.

features.title: Payment Processing
features.description: Secure payment integration with multiple gateways and cryptocurrency support.

features.title: Inventory Management
features.description: Advanced inventory tracking, stock alerts, and automated reordering features.

features.title: Analytics & Reporting
features.description: Comprehensive sales analytics, customer insights, and performance metrics.

features.title: Mobile Commerce
features.description: Fully responsive design optimized for mobile shopping and mobile payments.

features.title: SEO & Marketing Tools
features.description: Built-in SEO optimization and marketing tools to drive traffic and sales.

ecommerce-solutions.technologiesDescription: We use proven e-commerce platforms and modern technologies to build scalable online stores.
ecommerce-solutions.processDescription: From concept to launch, we follow a systematic approach to build successful online stores.

processSteps.title: Business Analysis
processSteps.description: We analyze your business model, target market, and competition to develop the optimal e-commerce strategy and platform selection.

processSteps.title: Store Design & UX
processSteps.description: We design user-friendly interfaces focused on conversion optimization, with attention to product display and checkout flow.

processSteps.title: Development & Integration
processSteps.description: We build your store with secure payment processing, inventory management, and integrate with your existing business systems.

processSteps.title: Testing & Launch
processSteps.description: Thorough testing of all store functions, payment processing, and performance optimization before going live.

ecommerce-solutions.packagesDescription: Complete e-commerce solutions from simple online stores to complex multi-vendor platforms.

packages.name: Starter Store
packages.description: Perfect for small businesses starting online

ecommerce-solutions.projectsDescription: See how we've helped businesses increase online sales with powerful e-commerce solutions.

featuredProjects.title: Fashion E-commerce Store
featuredProjects.description: Complete e-commerce solution for fashion retailer resulting in 200% increase in online sales and improved customer experience.

featuredProjects.title: B2B Wholesale Platform
featuredProjects.description: Custom B2B e-commerce platform with advanced pricing, bulk ordering, and integration with existing ERP systems.

ecommerce-solutions.faqDescription: Common questions about our e-commerce development services.

faqs.question: Which e-commerce platform is best for my business?
faqs.answer: The best platform depends on your business size, budget, and requirements. We typically recommend Shopify for most businesses, WooCommerce for WordPress users, and Magento for large enterprises. We'll help you choose the right platform during consultation.

faqs.question: Can you migrate my existing store to a new platform?
faqs.answer: Yes! We specialize in e-commerce migrations. We can transfer your products, customers, orders, and design to a new platform with minimal downtime and no data loss.

faqs.question: Do you provide payment gateway integration?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We integrate with all major payment gateways including Stripe, PayPal, Square, and many others. We also support cryptocurrency payments and buy-now-pay-later options.

faqs.question: Will my store be mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our e-commerce stores are fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. With over 50% of e-commerce traffic coming from mobile, this is a critical feature we always include.

ecommerce-solutions.ctaTitle: Ready to Launch Your Online Store?
ecommerce-solutions.ctaDescription: Let's build an e-commerce solution that drives sales and grows your business online.

ui-ux-design.title: UI/UX Design & Development
ui-ux-design.description: Create stunning user experiences with our comprehensive UI/UX design and development services. We combine beautiful interfaces with seamless functionality.
ui-ux-design.heroDescription: Create stunning user experiences with our comprehensive UI/UX design and development services. We combine beautiful interfaces with seamless functionality for maximum user engagement.
ui-ux-design.overviewDescription: We create digital experiences that users love and businesses benefit from. Our design process is data-driven and user-focused.

features.title: User Research
features.description: We conduct thorough user research to understand your audience and their needs.

features.title: Wireframing & Prototyping
features.description: Interactive prototypes that bring your ideas to life before development.

features.title: Visual Design
features.description: Beautiful, modern designs that align with your brand and engage users.

features.title: Usability Testing
features.description: We test designs with real users to ensure optimal usability and conversion.

features.title: Performance Focused
features.description: Designs optimized for fast loading and smooth interactions.

features.title: Conversion Optimization
features.description: Every design element is crafted to drive user action and business results.

ui-ux-design.technologiesDescription: We use industry-leading design tools and development frameworks to bring your vision to life.
ui-ux-design.processDescription: Our proven design process ensures we create user experiences that drive engagement and conversions.

processSteps.title: Research & Discovery
processSteps.description: We analyze your users, competitors, and business goals to inform our design strategy. This includes user interviews, surveys, and market analysis.

processSteps.title: Information Architecture
processSteps.description: We organize and structure your content and features in a logical, user-friendly way through sitemaps and user flows.

processSteps.title: Design & Prototyping
processSteps.description: We create wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes that visualize the final product and test usability.

processSteps.title: Development & Testing
processSteps.description: We build the design with clean, responsive code and conduct usability testing to ensure optimal user experience.

ui-ux-design.packagesDescription: Complete design and development packages tailored to your project needs and budget.
ui-ux-design.projectsDescription: See how our UI/UX design expertise has transformed businesses and user experiences.

featuredProjects.title: E-commerce Platform Redesign
featuredProjects.description: Complete redesign of an e-commerce platform resulting in 40% increase in conversion rates and improved user satisfaction.

featuredProjects.title: Mobile App Design
featuredProjects.description: User-centered design for a fintech mobile app with focus on security, usability, and modern aesthetics.

ui-ux-design.faqDescription: Common questions about our UI/UX design and development services.

faqs.question: What's the difference between UI and UX design?
faqs.answer: UX (User Experience) focuses on the overall feel and usability of the product, while UI (User Interface) focuses on the visual design and interactive elements. We provide both services integrated for the best results.

faqs.question: Do you provide design files and assets?
faqs.answer: Yes! You receive all design files, assets, and documentation. We provide Figma files, exported assets, style guides, and component documentation.

faqs.question: Can you redesign my existing website or app?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in redesigning existing products to improve user experience, increase conversions, and modernize the visual design.

faqs.question: Do you conduct user testing?
faqs.answer: Yes, usability testing is a key part of our process. We test designs with real users to identify issues and optimize for better user experience and conversion rates.

ui-ux-design.ctaTitle: Ready to Improve Your User Experience?
ui-ux-design.ctaDescription: Let's create a design that your users will love and that drives real business results.
